title: 82/411/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 June 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'PGT - Energy Dispersive Measurement System, model System III, with accessories' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 June 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Cahn - Recording Electrobalance, model Cahn 2000' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/412/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Cahn - Recording Electrobalance, model Cahn 2000', which is subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 2 December 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 June 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
